ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut cabbage into thick 1-1.5 inch steaks to hold together during cooking
Brush both sides with oil and garlic mixture for even seasoning and browning
Roast at high heat until edges are caramelized and centers are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you want tips on achieving crispy, caramelized edges while keeping the interior tender?
